value.content: window.document returns a reference to the document contained in the window.

value.title: Example
value.content: console.log(window.document.title);

value.title: Specifications
value.content:
Specification Status Comment

The definition of 'Window.document' in that specification.		 Living Standard
HTML5
The definition of 'Window.document' in that specification.		 Recommendation

doc.summary: window.document returns a reference to the document contained in the window.
